title: *Williamsburg Dplx w/Private Terrace & Direct Roofdeck Access* 25 4B
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties* We are the exclusive brokers for this building 

*Spacious Williamsburg Duplex with a Private Terrace & Direct Roofdeck Access*
The pictures are showing the actual available unit - I took them myself!
Broker fee of 12% of the annual rent is due at the lease signing 

*The Apartment Features:*
Duplex Layout / *Direct Roofdeck Access* / *Large Private Terrace* / 4 Sunny Bedrooms + Home Office / 2 Full Bathrooms - 1 with a Deep Soaking Tub & 1 with a Standing Shower / Great Closet Space / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Lots of Natural Light Throughout the Apartment / *Washer & Dryer in Unit* / AC Unit in Each Room / Open Concept Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Microwave / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom / 4th Floor Walk-up /

A Short Walk to McCarren Park and Bedford Ave
A Step Away from the L/G Trains at Lorimer/Metropolitan Station

Enjoy the Best Things that Williamsburg has to offer just Around the Corner: Union Pool, Night Of Joy, Pete's Candy Store, Silver Light Tavern, Beco, East River Walk, Domino Park, East River Ferry, Smorgasburg, and So Much More to Explore!

*Good credit history of 700+ and a combined annual income of $327,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! "Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*
